name: LEMAC Project
description: The goal of this project is to create a web app for LEMAC to be able to register entries in their laboratory, while keeping a live track of availability of the workstations in a public website.
initial_observations: This project is an outsorce project to LEMAC, as the name suggests
Initially we were a group of 4 members, not counting the PM, but at the start of this semester, the 4th group member left.

tasks.name_task: Create post route for log hours
Create route for getting sum of hours per member
Create get route getting log hours (all of them)
Create get route for getting personal log hours
Create put route for updating hour logs
